extension_description.message: Helps you easily navigate Google search results.

doc_title_settings.description: Title of the extension's options page.

shortcuts.description: A tab button name in options page.

other_settings.description: A tab button name in options page.

style_preview.description: Text of selected search result style preview.

left_line_style.description: Text of selected search result style.

dotted_rect_style.description: Text of selected search result style.

rgb_style.description: Text of selected search result style.

char_to_display.message: Characters to display when the number of results is greater than $MAX_NUM$

odd.description: The description of odd in other settings.

even.description: The description of even in other settings.

reset_all.message: Reset all settings to default, including shortcuts
reset_all.description: The description of reset all button in other settings.

confirm_reset_all.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default, including shortcuts?
confirm_reset_all.description: The message shown in the confirmation dialog.

debug_checkbox.description: The description of reset all button in other settings.

how_to_use.description: A tab button name in options page.

how_to_use_content.message: Press shortcut keys to navigate through the result in the Google search page.
how_to_use_content.description: The description of how to use.

about.description: A tab button name in options page.

about_content.message: I like shortcuts, but Google Search doesn't have that, so I wrote my own.

upward.description: The shortcut description for options page.

downward.description: The shortcut description for options page.

open_in_current_tab.message: Open selected result in current tab
open_in_current_tab.description: The shortcut description for options page.

open_in_new_tab_but_stay_on_current.message: Open selected result in new tab
open_in_new_tab_but_stay_on_current.description: The shortcut description for options page.

open_in_new_tab_and_focus.message: Open selected result in new tab and focus
open_in_new_tab_and_focus.description: The shortcut description for options page.

jump_to_result_keys.description: The shortcut description for options page.

next_page.description: The shortcut description for options page.

previous_page.description: The shortcut description for options page.

too_long.message: Must be less than or equal to $MAX_NUM$.
too_long.description: Jump to result keys invalid info.

must_be_unique_list.description: Jump to result keys invalid info.

valid_shortcut.description: Jump to result keys valid info.

error_while_saving.message: An error occurred while saving, check the console for more information.
